member.name: M:FLEXYGO.Reports.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Load event of the Page control. The page Should receive 4 Parameters -ObjectName: The Object Name -ObjectWhere: The Object where filter -ReportName: The Report Identifier -ReportMode: Word,Excel or PDF one oh the modes Additionally it can have Two more -And additional filter in Crystal Reports format using {} -The Param list for reports with additional params It is also possible to include the all under a unique id parameter encoded in Base64
member.param: The instance containing the event data.
member.exception: Report must have an Object Name or Report must have a Where condition or Report must have a Report Id or Can not print new objects. Please save object before printing. or
